## 2.2.4 Exercises

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
```

I have a 

```{r}
df <- structure(list(`Original sentence` = "'Yan sanda sun kama wanda ya sato tallafin korona na jihar Benue ya sayar a Kano.", 
    `Annotated tokenized sentence` = "\" Yan sanda sun kama wanda ya sato tallafin korona na jihar Benue ya sayar a Kano ."), row.names = c(NA, 
-1L), class = c("tbl_df", "tbl", "data.frame"))

```


```{r}
df %>%
clean_names()%>%


```
